## Our Objectives [(Proposed)]{.brand-grey} {.smaller}

::: {}
[2nd Semester 2024]{.brand-brown .bold}

Establish and manage the group; **Introduce** modeling concepts, ABMs, NetLogo, and the ODD Protocol ([Part I]{.brand-red .bold})
:::

::: {style="padding-top: 30px;"}
[1st Semester 2025]{.brand-brown .bold}

Explore the entire **ODD Protocol**, enabling participants to **create** and structure their own ABMs ([Part II]{.brand-red .bold})
:::

::: {style="padding-top: 30px;"}
[2nd semester 2025]{.brand-brown .bold}

Learn how to parameterize, calibrate, and **analyze** ABMs effectively<br>([Parts III & IV]{.brand-red .bold})
:::

::: {.notes}
:::
